We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private RelativeStrengthIndex _rsi;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_rsi = RSI(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_rsi.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Average Loss", _rsi.AverageLoss);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Average Gain", _rsi.AverageGain);
    Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Current", _rsi.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.rsi = self.RSI(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.rsi.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Average Loss", self.rsi.AverageLoss);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Average Gain", self.rsi.AverageGain);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "RSI Current", self.rsi.Current);
